metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6347 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Mojo in Google Chrome prior to 119.0.6045.199 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
